articles.title: Quebec couple on quarantined cruise ship in Japan test positive for coronavirus - The Globe and Mail
articles.description: The couple from Gatineau, Que., are currently waiting to be transported by ambulance to a military hospital where they will be kept in isolation until they no longer test positive for the virus
articles.content:
A bus leaves a port where the quarantined Diamond Princess cruise ship is docked Saturday, Feb. 15, 2020, in Yokohama, near Tokyo. 
The Associated Press
